__MiPerfil: My Profile Modal and My Profile Component

MI_PERFIL.DESCRIPCION_SECCION: In this section, you can view and edit your personal information, as well as add your vehicles and travel preferences.
MI_PERFIL.CUENTANOS: You can tell everything you want about yourself!

HOME.NEW_TRAVEL_TITLE: Do you want to share your next trip?

TITLE: PrideRide

JUMBOTRON.TITLE: Whoever you are, we travel with you

INFO.TEXT_ONE: Explore new adventures and incredible destinations. Find travel companions who share your passion for discovering the world.
INFO.TEXT_TWO: Plan your next trip with ease. Connect with people heading in the same direction.
INFO.TEXT_THREE: Share your experiences and create unforgettable memories with travelers like you.

MI_PERFIL2.TITLE: My Details
MI_PERFIL2.SUBTITLE: In this section, you can modify the personal details displayed to others as well as your travel preferences. You will also have the option to verify your details.
MI_PERFIL2.NO_USO: I don’t use any specific one

SELECTOR_GENERO.TITLE: What gender do you identify with?

MI_PERFIL2.PLACE_SOBRETI: Feel free to share whatever you'd like others to know about you

VERIFICAR.TITLE: Verify Your Contact Details and Documents
VERIFICAR.SUBTITLE: A verified user provides greater reliability to others. Remember that to be a verified user, you need to confirm your email, phone, and document. Additionally, if you ever want to post a trip, you’ll need to upload a photo of your driver’s license.
VERIFICAR.CORREO_SUBTITLE: An email will be sent to your address; you just need to confirm it through the link provided.
VERIFICAR.TELEFONO_SUBTITLE: Enter the 4 digits you received here:

VERIF_ADICIONAL.TITLE: Additional Verification
VERIF_ADICIONAL.SUBTITLE: Complete this verification if you plan to post a trip as a driver. You must upload a photo of your valid driver’s license (both sides). You only need to upload it once.

MODAL_INFOVISIBLE.SUBTITULO: This is the information that will be visible to others

MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.SUBTITULO1: A verified user provides greater trust to other users.
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.SUBTITULO2: Therefore, in this section, you can verify your personal details (email, phone number, and identity document)
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.SUBTITULO3: Additionally, if at any point you want to drive during a trip, you must upload a valid photo of your driving license. You can register it now in this section.
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.CORREO_SUBTITULO: An email will be sent to your address, you just need to confirm the link that will appear.
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.TFNO_SUBTITULO: Enter here the 4 digits you received:
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.IDENTIDAD_SUBTITULO: Using the button on the left, you can upload a photo of your identity document, both sides.
MODAL_VERIFICACIONES.CCONDUCIR_SUBTITULO: If you plan to publish a trip at any point, we need your driving license verified.

MODAL_AJCUENTA.SUBTITULO: From here, you can change your password, choose your communication preferences, and permanently delete your account.
MODAL_AJCUENTA.PREFCOM_COMERCIALES: I agree to receive commercial communications via email
MODAL_AJCUENTA.PREFCOM_TERCEROS: I agree that my data may be used for commercial purposes by third parties
MODAL_AJCUENTA.BORRARCUENTA_SUBTITULO: This action will permanently delete your account. If you have a balance, remember to first transfer it to your bank account to avoid losing the money.

MODAL_SALDO.TITULO: Balance and transfers to your account
MODAL_SALDO.SUBTITULO1: In this section, you can check your available balance, view recent transactions, set up your top-up methods, and make top-ups.
MODAL_SALDO.SUBTITULO2: If you have a balance, you can transfer it to your bank account.

NUEVO_VIAJE.NO_REGISTER_ALERT: You are not yet registered to post a trip.
NUEVO_VIAJE.NO_CARNET_ALERT: You have not yet registered your driver’s license to post a trip.
NUEVO_VIAJE.HELP_CENTER_SUBTITLE: Do you have questions about your trips? We’re here to help.

SALDO.TITLE: Balance and Transfers
SALDO.SUBTITLE1: In this section, you can check your available balance, view recent transactions, set up your top-up methods, and make top-ups.
SALDO.SUBTITLE2: If you have balance, you can transfer it to your bank account.
